subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng made a follow-up shot at the buzzer in overtime and the Chicago Bulls beat the Toronto Raptors, 102-101, on Saturday night for their N.B.A.-leading 40th victory.
snippet: Luol Deng made a follow-up shot at the buzzer in overtime and the Chicago Bulls beat the Toronto Raptors, 102-101, on Saturday night for their N.B.A.-leading 40th victory.
